threats.name: Accidental authority escalation
threats.attack_vector: Bypassing task admission or misconfiguring authority policies to allow unintended execution.
threats.violation_consequence: Unauthorized execution or policy drift; requires operator rollback and audit review.

threats.name: Recursive recovery
threats.attack_vector: Triggering recovery on recovered errors or chaining recoveries beyond allowed depth.
threats.violation_consequence: Integrity violation; recovery halted and logged as non-recoverable.

threats.name: Silent memory loss
threats.attack_vector: Deleting or demoting memory without simulation, logging, or proof.
current_mitigations: Intentional forgetting requires simulation and proofs
threats.violation_consequence: Integrity breach; post-commit invariant violations require operator intervention.

threats.name: Narrative feedback loops
threats.attack_vector: Using narrative outputs to drive actions or modify control-plane state.
threats.violation_consequence: Control-plane contamination and loss of audit separation.

threats.name: Consent laundering
threats.attack_vector: Reusing expired or mismatched consent scopes to authorize embodiment egress.
current_mitigations: Explicit refusal frames on missing consent
threats.violation_consequence: Embodiment egress without valid consent; must be treated as a breach.

threats.name: Operator over-delegation
threats.attack_vector: Humans defer moral or policy judgment to system outputs.
threats.violation_consequence: Human process failure; requires training and policy review.

threats.name: Codex overreach
threats.attack_vector: Treating Codex suggestions as authoritative commands without admission review.
threats.violation_consequence: Unsafe task execution; requires audit correction and policy enforcement.
